bibl.seg: CRIBIORE Raffaella, Writing, Teachers, and Students in Graeco-Roman Egypt. (American Studies in Papyrology. 36.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1996, 4°, xiv-316 pp., figg., graphiques et 80 pll. ISBN 0-7885-0277-8. $49.95.

Diss. Columbia Univ. New York. - Part One. Introduction. - Part Two. Identifying School Exercises. - Part Three. Writing in Graeco-Roman Schools. - Conclusion. - Appendices (1. List of Teachers; - 2. List of Students). - Catalogue (1. Introduction; - 2. Catalogue; - 3. Items Excluded from the Catalogue). - Bibliography. Concordances. Index.
